about_the_game:
Coinage is a physics based coin pusher game where you unlock special ability "coins" as you play that can really change the game and cause chaos in the machine.

Through a series of themed levels you have two main goals:

  • Get the highest score and multiplier possible, before sinking the main toy.

  • Collect as many extra toys as possible and add them to your collection.

To achieve these goals you will be collecting "Ability Chips" that are scattered throughout the machine, you can then use these chips to purchase special coins that can help is a variety of ways, such as the bomb coin, which will blast the coins around it, or the magent coin which moves through the machine on it's own, bringing along other coins for the ride.
detailed_description:
Coinage is a physics based coin pusher game where you unlock special ability "coins" as you play that can really change the game and cause chaos in the machine.

Through a series of themed levels you have two main goals:

  • Get the highest score and multiplier possible, before sinking the main toy.

  • Collect as many extra toys as possible and add them to your collection.

To achieve these goals you will be collecting "Ability Chips" that are scattered throughout the machine, you can then use these chips to purchase special coins that can help is a variety of ways, such as the bomb coin, which will blast the coins around it, or the magent coin which moves through the machine on it's own, bringing along other coins for the ride.
name: Coinage

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (or later)
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Dual Core or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon RX 560 (or Greater)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Coinage is a physics based rogulike coin pusher game. Collect ability tokens by sinking them into the chute and then spend these on a variety of abilities which can cause coin chaos in the machine!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Japanese*, Korean*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
